data.name: Shoganai Sword(Not Playable For Now)
data.detailed_description:
This game part of main game.
Simple action sword fight.

there are a lot of characters and pics. You will fight for pics with that enemys.

FUTURES AND MECHANİCS
there are three mechanics for fight.
first one is sword. Sword have big hit area and you can copmbine with dash.
dash is another mechanic. You can use always. You don't need stamina or something because you will eliminate 1 hit you have to be fast.
last one is punch.
punch is slow but you can combine with dash but you have to good timing.

İf you win to fight you can take some photos.

data.short_description: This is simple simple action hentai fight game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: ryzen 3 2200G
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx 950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: ryzen 3 3100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: rx 5500
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
